title: Eight year old child hurt in possible accidental shooting
content:
Etna Green, Ind. (WNDU) -- An 8-year-old girl is in the hospital after officers believe she may have accidentally shot herself with a handgun Tuesday evening.
Emergency responders were called to the 9900-block of West C.R. 575 North in Etna Green just after 5:30 p.m. The girl is in stable-fair condition.
The Kosciusko County Sheriff’s Dept. says the incident appears to be an accident and that her injuries are not life threatening. They retrieved a .22-caliber handgun from the scene.
As is standard procedure, officers have contacted the Department of Child Services and they will work with the sheriff’s department to investigate.
